00031 namespace uStreamLib {
00032         DataBuf::DataBuf(void)
00033                 : Object(UOSUTIL_RTTI_DATABUF), m_pbpParent(NULL), m_uBID(0),
00034                 m_strBlock(NULL), m_uSize(0), m_uCount(0), m_uLimit(65536),
00035                 m_bInUse(false), m_asStrategy(ALLOC_ONUSE)
00036         {
00037                 // nothing to do
00038         }
00039 
00040         DataBuf::~DataBuf(void)
00041         {
00042                 if (m_strBlock)
00043                         ::free(m_strBlock);
00044         }
00045 
00046         int32 DataBuf::init(uint32 size, uint32 bid, uint32 limit,
00047                 AllocStrategy strategy, BufferPool* bp)
00048         {
00049                 // setup strategy
00050                 m_asStrategy = strategy;
00051 
00052                 // check requested size (zero fails)
00053                 if (!size)
00054                         return FAILURE;
00055 
00056                 // align memory size to 64 bit boundaries
00057                 if (size % 8)
00058                         m_uSize = ((size >> 3) + 1) << 3;
00059                 else
00060                         m_uSize = size;
00061 
00062                 // allocate memory only if alloc on create
00063                 if (strategy == ALLOC_ONCREATE) {
00064                         m_strBlock = (char *) malloc(m_uSize);
00065                         if (!m_strBlock)
00066                                 return FAILURE;
00067                 } else {
00068                         m_strBlock = NULL;
00069                         m_uSize = 0;
00070                 }
00071 
00072                 // initialize members
00073                 m_uBID = bid;
00074                 m_uCount = 0;
00075                 m_uLimit = limit;
00076                 m_pbpParent = bp;
00077                 m_bInUse = false;
00078 
00079                 // check limit
00080                 if (m_uSize > m_uLimit)
00081                         m_uLimit = m_uSize;
00082 
00083                 // ok
00084                 setOk(true);
00085                 return SUCCESS;
00086         }
00087 
00088         int32 DataBuf::init(char* string)
00089         {
00090                 // memory size is enough for this string
00091                 uint32 uStrLen = (uint32) strlen(string) + 1;
00092 
00093                 // stretch to a larger size
00094                 if (uStrLen <= 16)
00095                         m_uSize = 32;
00096                 else
00097                         m_uSize = uStrLen;
00098 
00099                 // align memory size to 64 bit boundaries
00100                 if (m_uSize % 8)
00101                         m_uSize = ((m_uSize >> 3) + 1) << 3;
00102 
00103                 // allocate memory
00104                 m_strBlock = (char *) malloc(m_uSize);
00105                 if (!m_strBlock)
00106                         return FAILURE;
00107 
00108                 // initialize members
00109                 m_uBID = 0;
00110                 m_uCount = uStrLen;
00111                 m_uLimit = m_uSize << 1;
00112                 m_asStrategy = ALLOC_ONCREATE;
00113                 m_bInUse = false;
00114                 m_pbpParent = NULL;
00115 
00116                 // copy string into buffer
00117                 snprintf(m_strBlock, m_uSize, "%s", string);
00118 
00119                 // ok
00120                 setOk(true);
00121                 return SUCCESS;
00122         }
00123 
00124         int32 DataBuf::init(DataBuf& db)
00125         {
00126                 int32 ret = 0;
00127 
00128                 // initialize buffer
00129                 ret = init(db.getSize());
00130                 if (ret == FAILURE)
00131                         return FAILURE;
00132 
00133                 // copy data
00134                 copy(&db);
00135 
00136                 // ok
00137                 setOk(true);
00138                 return SUCCESS;
00139         }

00141         void DataBuf::copy(char* data, uint32 size)
00142         {
00143                 // copy of zero bytes not allowed
00144                 if (!size)
00145                         return;
00146 
00147                 // allocate memory if strategy is alloc on use
00148                 if (m_asStrategy == ALLOC_ONUSE && !m_strBlock) {
00149                         // align memory size to 64 bit boundaries
00150                         if (size % 8)
00151                                 m_uSize = ((size >> 3) + 1) << 3;
00152                         else
00153                                 m_uSize = size;
00154 
00155                         // allocate memory
00156                         m_strBlock = (char *) malloc(m_uSize);
00157                         if (!m_strBlock)
00158                                 return;
00159                 }
00160 
00161                 // check size
00162                 uint32 sz = size < m_uSize ? size : m_uSize;
00163                 if (!sz)
00164                         return;
00165 
00166                 // copy data
00167                 Memory::memCopy(m_strBlock, data, sz);
00168                 m_uCount = sz;
00169         }
00170 
00171         int32 DataBuf::xcopy(char* data, uint32 size)
00172         {
00173                 // copy of zero bytes not allowed
00174                 if (!size)
00175                         return FAILURE;
00176 
00177                 // allocate memory if strategy is alloc on use
00178                 if (m_asStrategy == ALLOC_ONUSE && !m_strBlock) {
00179                         // align memory size to 64 bit boundaries
00180                         if (size % 8)
00181                                 m_uSize = ((size >> 3) + 1) << 3;
00182                         else
00183                                 m_uSize = size;
00184 
00185                         // allocate memory
00186                         m_strBlock = (char *) malloc(m_uSize);
00187                         if (!m_strBlock)
00188                                 return FAILURE;
00189                 }
00190 
00191                 // perform reallocation if needed
00192                 if (m_uSize < size) {
00193                         // align memory size to 64 bit boundaries
00194                         if (size % 8)
00195                                 m_uSize = ((size >> 3) + 1) << 3;
00196                         else
00197                                 m_uSize = size;
00198 
00199                         // allocate memory
00200                         m_strBlock = (char *) ::realloc(m_strBlock, m_uSize);
00201                         if (!m_strBlock)
00202                                 return FAILURE;
00203                 }
00204 
00205                 // copy data
00206                 Memory::memCopy(m_strBlock, data, size);
00207                 m_uCount = size;
00208 
00209                 // ok
00210                 return SUCCESS;
00211         }

00213         int32 DataBuf::merge(char* data, uint32 size)
00214         {
00215                 uint32 uRequiredSize = 0;
00216 
00217                 // copy of zero bytes not allowed
00218                 if (!size)
00219                         return FAILURE;
00220 
00221                 // allocate memory if strategy is alloc on use
00222                 if (m_asStrategy == ALLOC_ONUSE && !m_strBlock) {
00223                         // align memory size to 64 bit boundaries
00224                         if (size % 8)
00225                                 m_uSize = ((size >> 3) + 1) << 3;
00226                         else
00227                                 m_uSize = size;
00228 
00229                         // allocate memory
00230                         m_strBlock = (char *) malloc(m_uSize);
00231                         if (!m_strBlock)
00232                                 return FAILURE;
00233                 }
00234 
00235                 // compute new size
00236                 uRequiredSize = m_uCount + size;
00237 
00238                 // stretch buffer if necessary
00239                 if (m_uSize < uRequiredSize) {
00240                         // align memory size to 64 bit boundaries
00241                         if (size % 8)
00242                                 m_uSize = ((uRequiredSize >> 3) + 1) << 3;
00243                         else
00244                                 m_uSize = uRequiredSize;
00245 
00246                         // allocate memory
00247                         m_strBlock = (char *) ::realloc(m_strBlock, m_uSize);
00248                         if (!m_strBlock)
00249                                 return FAILURE;
00250                 }
00251 
00252                 // copy data
00253                 Memory::memCopy(&m_strBlock[m_uCount], data, size);
00254                 m_uCount = uRequiredSize;
00255 
00256                 // ok
00257                 return SUCCESS;
00258         }
00259 
00260         int32 DataBuf::realloc(uint32 size)
00261         {
00262                 // realloc of zero bytes not allowed
00263                 if (!size)
00264                         return FAILURE;
00265 
00266                 // allocate memory if strategy is alloc on use
00267                 if (m_asStrategy == ALLOC_ONUSE && !m_strBlock) {
00268                         // align memory size to 64 bit boundaries
00269                         if (size % 8)
00270                                 m_uSize = ((size >> 3) + 1) << 3;
00271                         else
00272                                 m_uSize = size;
00273 
00274                         // allocate memory
00275                         m_strBlock = (char *) ::malloc(m_uSize);
00276                         if (!m_strBlock)
00277                                 return FAILURE;
00278                 }
00279 
00280                 // do nothing if memory size is ok
00281                 if (size == m_uSize)
00282                         return SUCCESS;
00283 
00284                 // align memory size to 64 bit boundaries
00285                 if (size % 8)
00286                         m_uSize = ((size >> 3) + 1) << 3;
00287                 else
00288                         m_uSize = size;
00289 
00290                 // allocate memory
00291                 m_strBlock = (char *) ::realloc(m_strBlock, m_uSize);
00292                 if (!m_strBlock)
00293                         return FAILURE;
00294 
00295                 // ok
00296                 return SUCCESS;
00297         }

00299         void DataBuf::move(int32 to, int32 from, uint32 size)
00300         {
00301                 register uint32 fps = from + size;
00302                 register uint32 tps = to + size;
00303 
00304                 // move of zero bytes not allowed
00305                 if (!size)
00306                         return;
00307 
00308                 // check to and from against 0
00309                 if (to < 0 || from < 0)
00310                         return;
00311 
00312                 // check to and from against size
00313                 if ((uint32) to > m_uSize)
00314                         return;
00315                 if ((uint32) from > m_uSize)
00316                         return;
00317 
00318                 // check fps and tps against size
00319                 if (fps > m_uSize)
00320                         return;
00321                 if (tps > m_uSize)
00322                         return;
00323 
00324                 // copy memory
00325                 Memory::memCopy(m_strBlock + to, m_strBlock + from, size);
00326         }
00327 
00328         void DataBuf::moveOnStart(int32 from, uint32 size)
00329         {
00330                 register uint32 fps = from + size;
00331 
00332                 // move of zero bytes not allowed
00333                 if (!size)
00334                         return;
00335 
00336                 // check from against 0
00337                 if (from < 0)
00338                         return;
00339 
00340                 // check from against size
00341                 if ((uint32) from > m_uSize)
00342                         return;
00343 
00344                 // check fps against size
00345                 if (fps > m_uSize)
00346                         return;
00347 
00348                 // copy memory
00349                 Memory::memCopy(m_strBlock, m_strBlock + from, size);
00350         }
00351 
00352         void DataBuf::set(int32 value)
00353         {
00354                 register uint32 uWC = m_uSize >> 3;
00355                 register int32 * dst = (int32 *) m_strBlock;
00356 
00357                 // check memory pointer
00358                 if (!m_strBlock)
00359                         return;
00360 
00361                 // copy 4 bytes at time
00362                 while (uWC--) {
00363                         *(dst++) = value;
00364                         *(dst++) = value;
00365                 }
00366         }
00367 
00368         void DataBuf::set(uint32 offset, int32 value)
00369         {
00370                 // check memory pointer
00371                 if (!m_strBlock)
00372                         return;
00373 
00374                 // check offset
00375                 if (offset > m_uSize)
00376                         return;
00377 
00378                 // copy memory
00379                 ::memset(&m_strBlock[offset], value, m_uSize - offset);
00380         }
00381 
00382         void DataBuf::printHex(void)
00383         {
00384                 uint32 i = 0;
00385 
00386                 // check memory pointer
00387                 if (!m_strBlock)
00388                         return;
00389 
00390                 // print hexadecimal values in buffer
00391                 for (i = 0; i < m_uCount; i++) {
00392                         if (isprint(m_strBlock[i]))
00393                                 printf("  %c ", m_strBlock[i]);
00394                         else
00395                                 printf("%02X ", m_strBlock[i]);
00396                 }
00397         }
